Description:
I/230322/DRB/1 : 

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating abrasive discs of the "Kamasa-Tools" Bench Grinder.

I/230322/DRB/2 :

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the cutting tool of the "Bridgeport" milling machine.

I/230322/DRB/3 :

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the cutting tool of the "Gate PBM-2000" milling machine.

I/230322/DRB/4 :

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating chuck of the "Record" Tapping machine, registration number 1858.
